# dittoed

A tool to bootstrap your development environment on new machines.


# Installation

Install via `pip`:

    $ pip install dittoed

Or `pipx`:

    $ pipx install dittoed


# Usage

To install your environment:

    $ ditto install [ROUTINE]

To update your environment:

    $ ditto update [ROUTINE]
